details.description:
Seonho Kim is a research engineer in Saltlux, Inc., the Knowledge Communication Company, headquartered in Seoul, Korea.

He received M.S and is also a candidate Ph.D. in Medical Informatics from Kyunghee University, Korea. Seonho has been researching on semantic technology area in the perspective of representing knowledge specially for Traditional Oriental Medicine, and developing semantic technology in Saltlux.

He has participated in several R&D projects of the Korean Government, as well as the LarKC FP7 project. Seonho is the author of several international papers (ISWC2011, ESWC2011, SWJ2012).
details.excerpt: Seonho Kim is a research engineer in [Saltlux, Inc.](http://www.saltlux.com), the Knowledge Communication Company, headquartered in Seoul, Korea.
